name: What If Murphy...
description:
What If Murphy... is an interactive fiction that follows the story of Murphy, a college student who has severe harm OCD. 

One day, when he drives back home from college, he doubts whether he ran over a pedestrian. 

It's up to you what happens to him next, 

Credits

A game by Ali Saneei

Music written and performed by Ali Saneei

This game uses the following sounds from freesound. They were modified to suit the needs of the game.

"Big rain drops (1).MP3" by macdaddyno1 (https://freesound.org/people/macdaddyno1/sounds/396484/), licensed under CC0 1.0. 

"Rain and Thunder 4" by FlatHill (https://freesound.org/people/FlatHill/sounds/237729/), licensed under CC0 1.0.
